definition: farmstead/village/manor/place of business/banker (in a gambling game)/grave or solemn/holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)

sentences.english: They are wanted in the farm much oftener than I can get them.
sentences.chinese: 農莊是要用馬，但是到我手裏的時候並不多啊。

sentences.english: The venue was the Environmental Protection Farm in Taipo.
sentences.chinese: 地點是大埔大尾督香港環保農莊。

sentences.english: The owner of his farm is a white man from Pretoria.
sentences.chinese: 他的農莊主人是來自首都比勒陀利亞的白人。

sentences.english: They spent a day and a night in the farm of a very poor family.
sentences.chinese: 他們父子在一個農莊最貧窮的人家裏住了一天一宿。

sentences.english: The old gentleman owned a lot of farms and over a hundred niggers .
sentences.chinese: 老紳士擁有好幾處農莊，黑奴在一百個以上。

sentences.english: We are working in a collective farm.
sentences.chinese: 我們在一個集體農莊裏工作。

sentences.english: The Alleycats invite school groups to the farm to help out.
sentences.chinese: 野貓農莊邀請學校團體到農場幫忙。

sentences.english: We'll visit the collective farm another time.
sentences.chinese: 我們另找時間訪問那所集體農莊。

sentences.english: On the farms the hens brooded , but no chicks hatched.
sentences.chinese: 在農莊，母雞下蛋卻孵不出小雞。

sentences.english: This program relies on zhuangqiao lake's special resource advantages and wants to develop special leisure farm.
sentences.chinese: 本項目依託莊柴湖獨特資源優勢，開發特色休閒農莊。

sentences.english: He that willhavehis farm full, must keep an old cock andayoung bull.
sentences.chinese: 若想使農莊充裕，必須有一隻老母雞和一頭嫩牛仔。

sentences.english: He that will have his farm full,must keep an old cock and a young bull.
sentences.chinese: 想使農莊充裕，就得養一隻老公雞和一頭小公牛。

sentences.english: Oh, I’d love to live in the country on a farm but I can’t.
sentences.chinese: 噢，我想住在一個農莊的農場裏，但是我做不到。

sentences.english: That's why we've called our place Lone Willow Farm.
sentences.chinese: 那就是我們稱我們住的地方爲孤柳農莊的原因。

sentences.english: The farm where we lived was called Näs. It still is.
sentences.chinese: 我們的農莊名叫Näs，直到現在還是這個名字。

sentences.english: He was arrested, for refusal to join the collective farm.
sentences.chinese: 他因爲拒絕加入集體農莊而被捕入獄。

definition: to own exclusively/unique to/specific/there is only
School of Agriculture, school of thought of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
site developed for a group of related enterprises/(industrial or technology) park
to taste a small amount/to sample
